title: Detective Conan OVA 10: Kid in Trap Island
synopsis: In this entirely new story produced specifically for the DVD, Conan leads a group of young detectives against the phantom thief Kaitou Kid, who has his eyes set on a jewel at a hotel on an isolated island.
characters: ['Edogawa, Conan', 'Kuroba, Kaito', 'Yoshida, Ayumi', 'Tsuburaya, Mitsuhiko', 'Kojima, Genta', 'Mouri, Ran', 'Suzuki, Sonoko', 'Nakamori, Ginzou', 'Nezu, Shinzo', 'Yagami, Toshihiro']
